item_healing_potion_small.name: small healing potion
item_healing_potion_small.description: A small vial containing a red liquid that can heal minor wounds.

item_hunk_bread.name: hunk of bread
item_hunk_bread.description: A thick slice of fresh, crusty bread.

item_fresh_fish.name: fresh fish
item_fresh_fish.description: A recently caught fish, still fresh and glistening. It would make a good meal.

item_forest_berries.name: forest berries
item_forest_berries.description: A handful of wild berries growing along the path. They look edible.

item_frostpetal.name: frostpetal bloom
item_frostpetal.description: A rare alpine flower that thrives in cold, sheltered places. Said to have potent restorative properties.

item_swamp_fungus.name: pale fungus
item_swamp_fungus.description: A cluster of pale, rubbery fungi growing on a rotting log. It looks vaguely unwholesome.

item_fresh_carrot.name: fresh carrot
item_fresh_carrot.description: A crisp orange carrot, pulled fresh from the earth.

item_pumpkin.name: large pumpkin
item_pumpkin.description: A heavy orange pumpkin, good for carving or cooking. Might provide some sustenance.

item_ripe_apple.name: ripe apple
item_ripe_apple.description: A crisp, juicy red apple, freshly picked.

item_wild_herbs.name: wild herbs
item_wild_herbs.description: A bundle of fragrant wild herbs. Might be useful for cooking or alchemy.

item_ale.name: tankard of ale
item_ale.description: A foaming tankard of locally brewed ale. It smells of hops and barley.

item_raw_meat.name: raw meat
item_raw_meat.description: A piece of raw meat, likely from a wolf.

debug_poison_vial.name: Debug Poison Vial
debug_poison_vial.description: A vial containing a potent, fast-acting poison for testing purposes.

item_mana_potion_small.name: small mana potion
item_mana_potion_small.description: A small vial containing a swirling blue liquid that restores a minor amount of mana.

item_mana_potion_medium.name: mana potion
item_mana_potion_medium.description: A vial containing a swirling blue liquid that restores a moderate amount of mana.

scroll_raise_skeleton.name: Scroll of Raise Skeleton
scroll_raise_skeleton.description: A dusty scroll inscribed with necromantic runes.

scroll_raise_skeletal_mage.name: Scroll of Raise Skeletal Mage
scroll_raise_skeletal_mage.description: A scroll covered in complex necromantic diagrams.

scroll_summon_spirit_wolf.name: Scroll of Summon Spirit Wolf
scroll_summon_spirit_wolf.description: A scroll that smells faintly of ozone and pine needles.

scroll_summon_fire_imp.name: Scroll of Summon Fire Imp
scroll_summon_fire_imp.description: The parchment is warm to the touch and smells of sulfur.

scroll_summon_stone_golem.name: Scroll of Summon Stone Golem
scroll_summon_stone_golem.description: A heavy, gritty scroll that feels like sandpaper.

item_scroll_random.name: Scroll of {spell_name}
item_scroll_random.description: A scroll inscribed with the runes for the '{spell_name}' spell.
